title: One K Wheels show 930g road wheelset with carbon fiber spoke system
content:
While these wheels wonâ€™t be released until Spring 2022, the sub-1000g weight makes them worth looking into. Claiming road bike wheels as light as 930g, One K Wheels uses a composite spoke structure to replace the steel spokes and reduce overall wheel weight by 20% or more. Designed with two sheets of spokes per side,
